snippet: Newcastle United have completed the signing of midfielder Matt Ritchie on a five-year deal from Premier League side Bournemouth, the Championship club said on Friday....

headline.main: Ritchie Signs Five-Year Deal With Newcastle
headline.print_headline: Ritchie Signs Five-Year Deal With Newcastle

lead_paragraph: Newcastle United have completed the signing of midfielder Matt Ritchie on a five-year deal from Premier League side Bournemouth, the Championship club said on Friday.

snippet: Bournemouth manager Eddie Howe addressed the issue of inconsistency with his players after Monday's loss to leaders Chelsea condemned them to their sixth defeat in nine games....

headline.main: Bournemouth Must Improve Consistency, Says Howe
headline.print_headline: Bournemouth Must Improve Consistency, Says Howe

lead_paragraph: Bournemouth manager Eddie Howe addressed the issue of inconsistency with his players after Monday's loss to leaders Chelsea condemned them to their sixth defeat in nine games.

snippet: A crackdown on behaviour will kick in when the new English season starts with referees instructed to show yellow and red cards to unruly players, the Premier League said on Wednesday....

headline.main: Players in England Warned to Be on Best Behaviour, or Else
headline.print_headline: Players in England Warned to Be on Best Behaviour, or Else

lead_paragraph: A crackdown on behaviour will kick in when the new English season starts with referees instructed to show yellow and red cards to unruly players, the Premier League said on Wednesday.

snippet: Sunderland manager Sam Allardyce reckons Atletico Madrid boss Diego Simeone would be labelled boring for his defence-oriented style if the Argentine were managing a Premier League club....

headline.main: Simeone Would Be Branded Boring in English Football-Allardyce
headline.print_headline: Simeone Would Be Branded Boring in English Football-Allardyce

lead_paragraph: Sunderland manager Sam Allardyce reckons Atletico Madrid boss Diego Simeone would be labelled boring for his defence-oriented style if the Argentine were managing a Premier League club.

snippet: Sunderland have bolstered their defence by signing the Manchester United duo of Paddy McNair and Donald Love for a combined deal worth 5.5 million pounds, the Premier League club announced on Thursday....

headline.main: Sunderland Sign McNair and Love From Manchester United
headline.print_headline: Sunderland Sign McNair and Love From Manchester United

lead_paragraph: Sunderland have bolstered their defence by signing the Manchester United duo of Paddy McNair and Donald Love for a combined deal worth 5.5 million pounds, the Premier League club announced on Thursday.

snippet: Tottenham Hotspur manager Mauricio Pochettino says his team are more focussed on getting into the Premier League's top four than chasing down leaders Chelsea....

headline.main: Tough for Tottenham to Catch Chelsea, Says Pochettino
headline.print_headline: Tough for Tottenham to Catch Chelsea, Says Pochettino

lead_paragraph: Tottenham Hotspur manager Mauricio Pochettino says his team are more focussed on getting into the Premier League's top four than chasing down leaders Chelsea.

snippet: The English Football Association is facing a no-confidence vote in the House of Commons and the enforced overhaul of decision-making functions dominated by "elderly men." British legislators made the announcement after being told by former FA lead...

headline.main: English FA Faces Lawmakers' No-Confidence Vote, Reforms
headline.print_headline: English FA Faces Lawmakers' No-Confidence Vote, Reforms

lead_paragraph: The English Football Association is facing a no-confidence vote in the House of Commons and the enforced overhaul of decision-making functions dominated by "elderly men." British legislators made the announcement after being told by former FA leaders that the governing body's failure to challenge the financial might of the Premier League contributes to the England team's "embarrassing failures."

snippet: Danny Drinkwater and Riyad Mahrez are likely to start for Leicester City against West Ham United in Saturday's Premier League clash, manager Claudio Ranieri has indicated....

headline.main: Drinkwater, Mahrez Set for Leicester Start Against Hammers
headline.print_headline: Drinkwater, Mahrez Set for Leicester Start Against Hammers

lead_paragraph: Danny Drinkwater and Riyad Mahrez are likely to start for Leicester City against West Ham United in Saturday's Premier League clash, manager Claudio Ranieri has indicated.

snippet: English soccer club Manchester United posted a 25 percent fall in quarterly core earnings as its absence from the lucrative Champions League competition and fewer home games at the start of the season hit its matchday revenue....

headline.main: Manchester United Quarterly Profit Falls by a Quarter on Lower Matchday Revenue
headline.print_headline: Manchester United Quarterly Profit Falls by a Quarter on Lower Matchday Revenue

lead_paragraph: English soccer club Manchester United posted a 25 percent fall in quarterly core earnings as its absence from the lucrative Champions League competition and fewer home games at the start of the season hit its matchday revenue.

snippet: West Ham United manager Slaven Bilic has admitted his team need to improve in front of goal and praised Liverpool striker Daniel Sturridge who has been linked with a move to the Premier League strugglers....

headline.main: West Ham's Bilic Praises Sturridge Before Liverpool Trip
headline.print_headline: West Ham's Bilic Praises Sturridge Before Liverpool Trip

lead_paragraph: West Ham United manager Slaven Bilic has admitted his team need to improve in front of goal and praised Liverpool striker Daniel Sturridge who has been linked with a move to the Premier League strugglers.
